title: Ep. - 344 - HEATHER MCDONALD REVIEWS OPERATION VARSITY BLUES: COLLEGE ADMISSIONS SCANDAL BEHIND THE SCENES OF DAYTIME TV WITH RACHEL WEINTRAUB
description:
Comedian and podcast host Heather McDonald reviews Operation Varsity Blues: The College Admissions Scandal, now streaming on Netflix, which documents the 2019 college admissions bribery scandal in the United States and is based on recorded conversations from the FBI investigation.

 

Rachel Weintraub is an award winning producer and Chief Creative Consultant. She is a creative force with a breadth of expertise in daytime television. She talks about her eight seasons as a producer for The View on ABC, as co-executive producer of the Gayle King Show for OWN and The People’s Court, and what it is really like behind the scenes of daytime television.

 

 

Reality Life with Kate Casey

Patreon: http://www.patreon.com/katecasey

Cameo: https://www.cameo.com/katecasey

Instagram: @katecaseyca
